features.getDetailsById:
select 
    iss.id as id_issue,
    iss.author,
    iss.posts_number as posts_number_issue,
    iss.pplVoted,
    iss.stars as stars_issue,
    iss.title as title_issue,
    iss.subtitle as subtitle_issue,
    iss.tags as tags_issue,
    iss.views as views_issues,
    iss.created_at,
      pst.id as id_post,
      pst.id_author,
      pst.stars as stars_post,
      issTxt.context,
      issTxt.enableNotifications,
      issTxt.deleted_at
      from  issue iss 
        inner join post pst on pst.id_issue in (iss.id)
        inner join issue_text_content issTxt on issTxt.id_post in (pst.id)
        and issTxt.id_issue in (iss.id) 
              where iss.id =
features.getPollDetailsById:
select 
	iss.id as id_issue,
	iss.author,
	iss.posts_number,
	iss.pplVoted,
	iss.stars,
	iss.views,
	iss.created_at,
    pst.id as id_post,
    pst.id_author,
    issPoll.title as poll_title,
    issPoll.question as poll_question,
    issPoll.created_at as poll_created_at,
    issPoll.updated_at as poll_updated_at,
    issPoll.closingDate as poll_closingDate,
    issPoll.closingTime as poll_closingTime,
    issPoll.displayWhoVoted as poll_displayWhoVoted,
    issPoll.hasMultipleChoice as poll_hasMultipleChoice,
    '' as poll_answers
		from  issue iss 
        inner join post pst on pst.id_issue = iss.id
			inner join issue_poll issPoll on issPoll.id_post = pst.id
            where issPoll.id_issue =

features.getAnswersByIdIssue:
SELECT issPollResponse.answer FROM  issue_poll issPoll
inner join issue_poll_response issPollResponse on issPollResponse.id_poll in (issPoll.id)
where issPoll.id_issue =
